2 Chronicles 36:23 thusH3541 saysH0559 CyrusH3566 kingH4428 of Persia,H6539 allH3605 the kingdomsH4467 of the earthH0776 has givenH5414 YahwehH3068 GodH0430 of heavenH8064 and HeH1931 has commandedH6485 meH5921 to buildH1129 a houseH1004 at Jerusalem,H3389 which isH0834 in Judah .H3063 Who [is]H4310 of allH3605 his people?H5971 YahwehH3068 his GodH0430 May [be] with himH5973 and let him go up.H5927
